short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save for your home while you shop!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save for your home while you shop!  

Add the UpIt extension to your Google Chrome browser and get notified whenever you are visiting an UpIt Retail Partner.  When you have an active UpIt or HomeFundIt account or are supporting an active UpIt or Retail account, a percentage of your purchase at participating UpIt Retail Partners will be pledged toward the userâ€™s down payment.  

UpIt by HomeFundIt Features
-Raise a down payment through everyday shopping.
-Up to 20% of every eligible purchase pledged to your campaign.
-Get access to coupons, specials, and deals from UpIt retail partners.
-Have a group of people shop with UpIt to help you.
-Anyone can support you (friends, family, strangers).
-You can start raising funds years before you start looking for a home.
-Funds are available for a home purchase within 24 hours.
-No prequalification needed, start using UpIt in less than 5 minutes.
